column1: Narrator : Sail ho! An immense imperial boat catches up, its weapons threateningly pointed at NOMBATEAU. An officer on the deck hails you.

column6: Choice : Just sailin’ by... G'day to ye! (leave)
column9: Choice : Give 'em no quarter boys! Yaargh! (attack)

column1: OtherSpeak : Oh my! If it isn’t the infamous CAPITAINE!
column2: OtherSpeak : Tell me, CAPITAINE, what brings you to these parts?

column1: OtherSpeak : Soldiers, lower the weapons! I heard the stories, you’re one of the most trustworthy captains sailing our ocean.
column3: OtherSpeak : We've heard good things about you, but not only. Be careful, we'll be keeping an eye on you.
column4: OtherSpeak : Hey I know you! Your face is on all the wanted posters of the kingdom!
column7: OtherSpeak : It does, but you won’t find anything here.
column8: OtherSpeak : Those are tales. Only kids would believe in them.
column11: OtherSpeak : You need to prove you really need help.

column1: OtherSpeak : We’ll help you, whatever you need Tell us what you require and the Crown will gladly provide it!
column3: OtherSpeak : Anything we should know about?
column4: OtherSpeak : The captain’ll know what to do with you…
column7: OtherSpeak : Try DIRECTIONTOFORMULA, that's where everybody seems to go.

column1: OtherSpeak : Don’t mind if I do!
column2: OtherSpeak : Don’t push your luck now…

column13: OtherSpeak : That old salt CAPITAINE! It would be my pleasure!
column17: OtherSpeak : Sir, it would be an honor to be part of the crew !

column8: Choice : Wouldn't mind some extra hands if ye can spare 'em. (member)
column11: Choice : We be fine for now. (leave)

column8: OtherSpeak : I might have a few available.
column14: Choice : Who else do ye have? (other)
column17: Choice : Ye’re in, welcome to the NOMBATEAU! (member)

column8: OtherSpeak : Some men have been seen twiddling their thumbs lately.
column18: OtherSpeak : I was the last one, captain!
OtherSpeak : Let me take you back to my boss.

column1: OtherSpeak : There’s BOUNTY gold coins on your head, criminal!
OtherSpeak : Pay BOUNTY or die like the rat you are!
Choice : I’ll pay, here’s the money… (trade)
column3: Choice : It’s out of the question! (attack)

column1: OtherSpeak : Good… Your debt is clear.
OtherSpeak : Scram now, I don’t want to see your ugly face around here again!
column2: OtherSpeak : Jail would be too good for you, we’ll deal with you now and feed you to the sharks!
OtherSpeak :  This is what you get, bloody pirate!

column4: Narrator : CAPITAINE is on the beach. Soldiers arrive from afar.
